thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Elisa Zucchiatti

author: Elisa Zucchiatti
title: Elisa Zucchiatti
text: It is wonderful to think that we will be able to travel, even on the spur of the moment, with the certainty that a pet sitter can be found. The site worked wonderfully. Within hours we had more requests than we could handle and had secured a sitter. We were very pleased with her and all worked well. It is such a good idea for all! The actual website is very easy to navigate, clear and informative. The user manuals are very well done! I will reccommend to friends and for sure use again!
